storyInfo: Hoshiguma hops onto her beloved motorcycle for the first time in a while, spending one of her precious vacation days enjoying the wind, until she comes to a surprising encounter at the end of the road.

attributes.content: (Yawn)
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Fold the blankets into dougan, and that'll do.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Wallet, keys, jacket...
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I'll... leave the comms gear.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Shield... leave that too. You rest easy for today, partner.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I'll kick these for shoes. Mmm. Nope, don't feel it. Maybe this limited edition pair? Ah, these feel pretty right. They match my outfit today.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Eh, let's go with the first ones after all.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: (Rolls eyes)
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Missy, perfect timing. Which pair do you think looks best?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Don't ask. Every part of you looks awful to me right now.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: What's wrong? You're in a rotten mood. Special day today?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Ngaang gau ah, nei!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: You were pounding on my door at dawn for this?! So I could watch you count SHOES? You've collected a billion pairs that all look basically the same to me!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: How are they the same? They're all different editions, the materials are all different... ugh, what am I doing telling you this.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Our dorms are next to each other. We're like neighbors. We help each other out.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Like I care about you!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Let me make this clear to you, today is my day off! It's three minutes to six right now, and if I sound this alarm, I can write you up for disturbing the peace!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: You want overtime? Fine! Do it yourself! You're gonna lose your hair working 24/7, but don't try to take my locks too!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Overtime nothing. Not often we get a day off, and the L.G.D. doesn't pay much more for overtime. They're pretty tight-pursed. I'm no workaholic like Ch'en either.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: And Missy, are you one to talk? Didn't you just come back from the L.G.D.? I heard you opening and slamming the door. That one traveled.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Piss off! I'm so done right now!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Our plate's loaded! We've got the mess Reunion left, we've got business with that stinky old rat... and that puk gaai dragon isn't even here when it matters. What DOESN'T need doing?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: You got promoted, and they want you transferred? Transferred where? Are we just going to give the Special Inspection Unit to someone else?!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I've had it up to HERE!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Calm down, calm down. It's not like Mr. Wei hasn't thought it through. He's training you.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: For when the L.G.D. is your responsibility. If you ask me, it's just a matter of time.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: You can do it.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: You... you don't need to tell me! Of course I know that already!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Bâ€”But she was supposed to take over the L.G.D... She was groomed for it...
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: *Sigh*. Don't you go crying again.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Who's crying?!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Just you wait. Who cares if some smelly dragon never comes back. Sooner or later I'll seize the L.G.D. for myself. All of it, just you wait.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Ha ha, now that's something to look forward to.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Ugh. No, wait. Did you just say you heard me opening the door when I came back? So you knew I hadn't slept all night?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Then why the hell did you still call me over? You said you didn't do it on purpose!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Hey, hey, don't get worked up.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I was worried you were pushing yourself too hard. Been a lot happening lately, and we haven't really gotten the chance to meet up, right?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Here, I bet you skipped breakfast again, right? I bought some breakfast. It's your favorite chow fun. Eat a little before you go to sleep.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Hmph. Didn't ask you to.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Fine, fine, you didn't ask me to. Will you still eat it?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Of course I will! Give it!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Hey, why'd you buy two portions? How am I gonna finish this much?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Oh... that was two? Must've been habit. Bought them without thinking.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Three-mushroom shredded fowl, saa sin sauce, extra starchroot... Hmph, only that dummy would like it this way.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Their place uses pretty boring noodles. The flavor's too bland, they skimp on the ingredients. It's barely passable. Next time, remember: go downstairs from the L.G.D., turn the corner, second house down with the blue sign hung outside. They do better stuff.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Fine, I get it, I'll get you theirs next time. Just try and eat some for now. Woah, slow down! You don't have to inhale it.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: (Yawn)
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Oh, yeah, where are you going today? I'm up already, so you may as well count me in for some window-shopping.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I need to go buy that one Svrrovski piece. The new one from the JOKER series. It came out just last week.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Oh, the one Ch'en's had her eye on since forever ago?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Yep, that one. She's got a pretty good eye for those. She's better at picking out clothes and jewelry than I am.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Sounds like a compliment to me.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Personally, I don't even get to wear that kinda jewelry much after I buy it. Good thing she gets paid enough, and she lives in a free L.G.D. dorm. She'd be in dire straits otherwise.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Anyway, Missy, you're inviting me? That's pretty rare. Is this the first time ever?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: If I had anyone else, you think I'd wanna pick you?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I guess so. Whoa, actually, if I don't head out now I'll be late. Later.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Wait, going where? Hold on, I'm gonna do my makeup!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Don't. You're plenty fine even without making up, 'Miss.'
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Thanks for inviting me, but I'll have to pass today. I'm just going out for a spin, not much point in tagging along. I'll pick you up next time.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Get some sleep. Leave those bags under your eyes for too long, and it'll be rough when you finally wanna get them off.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: You need more rest, Swire, you really do.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Madame, good morning!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Morning. You've all worked enough. Want some breakfast? I got recommended a place, so I picked some up along the way.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Seriously, this early on a vacation day and I still see so many people in this building.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Ever since that whole incident, it's been like this non-stop, ugh.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Same goes for you, Madame Hoshiguma. You only left a few hours ago and now you're back. You're off today, if I remember?
attributes.name: Exhausted L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: No comparison. Things are different for me.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Forget that, are you really still okay? I feel like you're wobbling... Eat something, and lie down in the lounge for a bit. Lay off the energy drinks. They're not good for you.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Ah, thank you, Madame. But I'm okay. Once I'm done with the work I've got on hand, I can go home and sleep.
attributes.name: Exhausted L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: (Yawn)
attributes.name: Exhausted L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Fine. I won't say much more then. Just mind yourself.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: It's been all hands on deck lately. After we're past this, I'll take you all out for a feast.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: A feast? I'll pass. What I want is a raise.
attributes.name: Exhausted L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Two days ago I ran into the guy from that Rhodes Island office, flaunting his promotion in front of me... pah, what's to flaunt? You just get a few more vacation days than I do...
attributes.name: Exhausted L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: ...Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: The ones who worked with us? And the lot who took Madame Ch'en away?!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: I thought those guys scrammed ages ago!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Ah... you mean that local branch of theirs, right?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I think they do some recruitment too. Weren't there a few youngsters making trouble in the streets who got talked into picking up some work instead?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: They've got a way with words.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Don't you go stirring trouble for them. It's all Lungmen citizens working in that office. No picking bones.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Go back and tell the kiddos downstairs too. No getting mixed up.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: The hell I can. Everyone's clear deep down.
attributes.name: Exhausted L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Us and Rhodes Island get along fine enough. Once in a blue moon we'll have drinks together.
attributes.name: Exhausted L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: They've got plenty of weirdos there, and besides their local office people, you pass by them now and again on the street. Some just look wild. We can't help but stare a bit.
attributes.name: Exhausted L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Last week they had some kind of Laterano monastery girl with them... and not to mention they can all hold their liquor.
attributes.name: Exhausted L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Huh?! So the time you came back dead drunk, it was Rhodes who got you like that?! You threw up all over me!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Uh... did that happen?
attributes.name: Exhausted L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Damn right it did!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Fine, fine, my bad. Next time you file for a day off to go on a date with your girlfriend, I'll approve it, okay?
attributes.name: Exhausted L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Just hang in there until this bump's over, and every district we're rebuilding has its reconstruction schedules all sorted out. Then we'll be good.
attributes.name: Exhausted L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Of course I know that... Honestly, though, once this bump's over, I'm probably not gonna have a girlfriend anymore... *sigh*.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Hey, that works out. Won't need to approve your day off.
attributes.name: Exhausted L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Brutal. If you don't have anything nice to say...
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: He's just like that. I'm used to it.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Brat.
attributes.name: Exhausted L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Anyway, Madame, same to you. It's your day off. Don't hang around here, go on back and take a break pronto.
attributes.name: Exhausted L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Yeah, just leave things here to us!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Oh, looks like I'm not that popular. Or is there another reason you're trying to shoo me out here?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: N-No, that's not what I mean...!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Ha ha, alright, relax, I'm joking. I just came in to have a look, and drop off some food on the side.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Here, chow fun. You get to it, then. I'm leaving.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Whew, I'm tired.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I've only been up for a few days, and I'm already starting to buckle. Getting off-kilter.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I'm not getting old, right? Shouldn't be, I'm still young if I think about it hard enough...
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Maybe I am?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Ha, whatever...
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Hey, partner, what do you think? It's been a while since I gave you some exercise. Let's head out to that racetrack in Ngai Kang and give it a spin, feel the breeze.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Hey, your exhaust sounds a little off today. Don't tell me you're getting old too?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: No, of course not, you're definitely still latest model. 70vv.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Though I guess a model even newer than you just came out. Steady and smooth, fast as lightning. Their ads have always been pretty good, haven't they?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I still wanna get my hands on one to try, but they break the bank. It's okay, partner, we'll put up with each other for a bit. My wages aren't that high. Can't always spend like I did on you.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: You're far from out of date, and I'm far from retirement. We match pretty well, don't we?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: What's your opinion? What makes Ch'en so hard to crack?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Think she can get used to Rhodes Island? Is she gonna get into fights? I'm guessing so. It's not like she can't get along with people, it's just if she's not willing...
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Nay.
â€”Who's there!?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Miss Ch'en is no fossilized bonehead.
attributes.name: Shirayuki

attributes.content: Nor blindly headstrong.
attributes.name: Shirayuki

attributes.content: Ah, who's there? You're... Lady Shirayuki.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: (Nods)
attributes.name: Shirayuki

attributes.content: Madame Hoshiguma.
attributes.name: Shirayuki

attributes.content: I don't need the title. How come you're here, Lady Shirayuki?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: The Madam is away. My orders, to protect thee.
attributes.name: Shirayuki

attributes.content: Got it.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Lady Shirayuki, I heard the Madam recently assigned you to Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: How is it? Is little Amiya still holding up? And the Doctor by her side... I remember that one sticking behind cover giving orders. Freakishly smart, freakishly tired. How are they all now?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: In plentiful vigor, spirits held high.
attributes.name: Shirayuki

attributes.content: Raucous blather.
attributes.name: Shirayuki

attributes.content: Loud sort.
attributes.name: Shirayuki

attributes.content: Ha ha ha ha, sounds like they're still full of beans.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: It seems like you have a pretty nice impression of Rhodes Island, Lady Shirayuki.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Truly, Rhodes Island is agreeable.
attributes.name: Shirayuki

attributes.content: As goes for Miss Ch'en.
attributes.name: Shirayuki

attributes.content: ...Thou needn't dwell.
attributes.name: Shirayuki

attributes.content: What, so now even Lady Shirayuki's saying it... You're not telling me I've got worry written across my entire face? Seriously?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: That can't be right. If I was like that, Missy would've torn a layer off my face this morning.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: It's okay, Lady Shirayuki. I'm not worried about Ch'en, that's the truth.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Truest truth. Don't judge Ch'en by her cover. Sure, she'll snap like whiplash, but she's got a delicate heart in there.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I didn't see it coming when I first met her all the way back. Only came to realize after being with her a lot more. I believe as long as she has a brick wall to bash her head against, she'll live decent no matter where it is.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Intelligent and sharp-witted is Miss Ch'en.
attributes.name: Shirayuki

attributes.content: Tongue incisive, and her action ne'er pales.
attributes.name: Shirayuki

attributes.content: The commonfolk cannot hope to cheat her.
attributes.name: Shirayuki

attributes.content: Ha ha, true that.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Tell me, where do you find someone like her? Piss her off and she'll switch to chewing people out, and as long as there's reason, she'll chew out anyone. I've never seen her scared before.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Miss Ch'en... is unreserved.
attributes.name: Shirayuki

attributes.content: Honestly, Ch'en's temper hasn't changed once in all these years.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I've always felt she put a lot of stress on chivalry. In those manga about master swordsmen, her sort would be the main character.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: But, you know, blood and gore's fun enough to read about, but having those wounds on your own body really aches something fierce.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: There are times I see her aching beyond help, and I think, is it really worth this?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: It isn't worth it. In truth, in full honesty, I feel it truly isn't worth it.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: But she thinks it is.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I'm not worried if she comes to grief. A little grief is no bad thing. Get too strong-willed and you'll come to a lot worse.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I'm just scared that she can't get over it. That she can't let it go.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Miss Ch'en's soul is wide.
attributes.name: Shirayuki

attributes.content: Rid of her chest's weight, she is ever more unstoppable.
attributes.name: Shirayuki

attributes.content: You see clearly, Lady Shirayuki. And Master Wei and the Madam see even more plainly.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: You too, Madame Hoshiguma, are chivalrous.
attributes.name: Shirayuki

attributes.content: Me? Stop it, that's over the top now. I'm clear when it comes to myself.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: When I was young, I didn't know how things worked. I dreamed, of course, too.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I've done a lot of impulsive things, and it's not like I've never had some hot blood in me.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: But the hot-blooded story's over, the kid's no longer a kid, and now what? They wouldn't write this stuff in a story. Write it and the readers'd get mad. Total waste of effort. Save yourself the trouble of ever writing it.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Stories get to end at the best possible times. Life doesn't.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: If chivalry looked like me, carrying the weight of the world, then people wouldn't be into it.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: One cannot undervalue oneself.
attributes.name: Shirayuki

attributes.content: If you may see this.
attributes.name: Shirayuki

attributes.content: This is... a comic?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Tai Kam Road, Second Lane bookstore. This month's new publication.
attributes.name: Shirayuki

attributes.content: A present for thee.
attributes.name: Shirayuki

attributes.content: Really unexpected.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Much thanks. Though I'm surprised. You read this, Lady Shirayuki?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Madame will know at a gloss.
attributes.name: Shirayuki

attributes.content: Then. I, Shirayuki, take my leave.
attributes.name: Shirayuki

attributes.content: (This series...)
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: (A new artist's debut work. Second overall in readers' support, and other artists have been recommending it...)
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: (It seems pretty decent, too. Is this the protagonist on the cover?)
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: (Kinda... familiar...)
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: (This big one holding the shield is...)
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Ah, ha. So that's how it is. No wonder.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: They've got some guts. But they still know their work. Art's not bad, too.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Whatever. Whatâ€”ever...
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: If I ever see Ch'en again, what should I call her?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Operator Ch'en?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Pretty good. Pretty fitting, too.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: (Still not fast enough.)
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: (Got a curve up ahead. Perfect, I can still kick up a gear.)
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: The one-horned Oni lets out her breath.
It's been a long time since she sped through the wind so savagely. With every roar her beloved machine lets out beneath her, her young, brazen blood seems to flow again, in speed for its own sake.
â€”Until suddenly, behind her, sounds another mechanical beast's cries.
The L.G.D.'s Madame Hoshiguma comes back to her senses.
Mm?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: (Who is it...?)
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: (The sound's coming from behind, and getting closer.)
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Pretty good speed, catching up to me.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Heh, that model and that engine's sound. It's the latest one in the ads. Odds are it's modified, too.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Let's burn some rubber, partner. We can't lose.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: (Strange. When was there someone so good, and how did I never know?)
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: (And they kind of seem like...)
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: ('Tearing the vacant streets in the dead of night, the ghost driver in the flashes on the winding roads.')
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: (Wait, but the vehicle's not right. And I think I know who's driving it..)
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: ...No way?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: ...Phew.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: You're good. It's my loss.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I'm flattered. You took that curve very well. Had my machine not been somewhat better, I would never have overtaken.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Good morning, Inspector Hoshiguma.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: You're unbeatable, Madam Fumizuki.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Oh, my. You don't seem surprised at all.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: I'm pretty surprised, actually. It was too fast just before. I only dared to guess it was you after that curve.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Everyone's familiar with your principal vehicle, Madam, I'd never mistake it. Today's the first time I've seen those wheels, though.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Are you going to issue me a speeding ticket, then?
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Of course I couldn't. This racecourse is outside our jurisdiction, anyway, specifically for racing... If tickets were a thing out here, I wouldn't get away with it either.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Hehe. You've all been working terribly hard.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: That's our job. Nothing terrible about it.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: What's wrong, Inspector Hoshiguma? You seem like there's still something you want to say.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Eh... nothing much.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Just thinking, the wind out here feels really nice.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Flooring down an accelerator sure does wonders for my mood.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Quite right. Hear, hear!
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: In times with just too much to try and do, it truly feels a lot better once you've taken in the breeze.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Though that can't be all you wanted to say, can it?
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Huh... I guess there's no hiding it from you, Madam.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I was just thinkingâ€”
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: The Stream-35LL Luminous Luxury parked downstairs from Master Wei for the last two days, even though he doesn't seem like the biking type. Sure enough, it was never his.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma
